input: What does Section 105 of the IPC define?
target: Section 105 defines the commencement and continuance of the right of private defense of property.

input: When does the right of private defense of property begin under Section 105?
target: The right begins when there is a reasonable apprehension of danger to property.

input: When does the right of private defense of property end under Section 105?
target: The right ends when the offender has retreated, and the threat ceases.
